nodes.text: Tunms was a Human male who served as an officer in the Imperial Reclamation Service of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. He was stationed on the Imperial space station Vaiken Spacedock.

Reclamation Officer Tunms first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Pre-Order Crystal Vendor aboard Vaiken Spacedock; players who pre-ordered the game can acquire exclusive crystals from him.
